name: Kings - Zombies vs Kings world
description:
【game introduction】
This is a world of vampires and zombies. Game, players play the role of is king, leads the people in confrontation with evil zombie, this among them, you need some embankment malicious person, efforts in congress, balance between the people, the armed forces, the national Treasury, and contains many random events, careful decisions and careful planning to rule for a long time.
Every year during the reign of your may bring you a random request, the request may have a profound effect on your kingdom. So as far as possible to extend your rule, don't let the kingdom in his hand as the end of the dynasty.
At the same time, to establish a coalition against the zombies, and search for new methods to promote advance of the dynasty.
With the progress of era, some conspiracy may across the centuries.
The young king, zombie has come, war could...
Is life? Is death? You have the final say!
【game operating】
It is a strategy card combined with simulation operation of the game, the game operation simple is easy to get started, according to the plot of the tip, just slide around the card to choose.
